strategy.title: Overview
steps: Kill all 20 rare spawns in Outland zones
Rares have long respawn timers (6-24 hours typically)
Can take days or weeks of camping

strategy.title: Recommended Addons
steps: SilverDragon or NPCScan - alerts when rare is nearby
HandyNotes + RareScanner - shows spawn points on map
TomTom - waypoint navigation to spawn locations

strategy.title: Efficient Hunting
steps: Make a circuit through all Outland zones
Check each spawn point, then move to next zone
Use group finder to hop servers for more chances
Early morning server time often has less competition
Some rares path around - check the full route
